name: Kiwify
headline: Create & sell online courses
description:
Kiwify enables anyone to create and sell their online course in Brazil.
We provide payment processing, video streaming and student management
generated_description:
**Kiwify: Empowering Online Learning in Brazil**

Founded in 2020 and proud to be part of Y Combinator’s W21 batch, Kiwify is on a mission to revolutionize the way Brazilians create and sell online courses. Located in the vibrant landscape of Brazil, Kiwify caters to anyone looking to share their knowledge and make a profit from it, harnessing the growing e-learning trend.

At its core, Kiwify offers a streamlined platform for course creators, providing essential features such as payment processing, video streaming, and student management. It's about making the process easy and accessible. Whether you're an expert in your field or someone with passion and knowledge to share, Kiwify allows you to transform that into a structured course that can be sold to eager learners.

With a robust team of around 200 employees, Kiwify aims to support instructors at every step. They take care of the technology side, so you can focus on what you do best—teaching. Their custom-built payment processor, KiwiPay, ensures high approval rates for transactions, making it easier for course creators to maximize their sales without the hassle of intermediaries.

### What You Get with Kiwify

- **Premium Membership Area:** Course creators can customize a cinematic-style space for their courses, enhancing the learning experience.
  
- **Rapid Payment Processing:** With KiwiPay, you can get sales from Pix within two days, while credit card payments have options for 15 or 2 days.
  
- **1-Click Checkout:** This feature allows returning customers to save their payment information for a quick purchasing experience, significantly boosting conversion rates.
  
- **Engagement and Recognition:** Kiwify encourages participation and offers enticing rewards. For instance, creators who generate R$1 million in sales can appear on their podcast and win a trip to beautiful Balneário Camboriú. The stakes get even higher, as reaching R$10 million earns a trip to Dubai!

- **Exceptional Support:** Kiwify ensures rapid responses to queries with a dedicated customer support team, available every day of the week.

### The Kiwify Community

Kiwify is not just about tools; it’s about building a community. They regularly host exclusive events, like the Kiwify Festival, bringing together thousands of content creators to share insights, network, and learn.

### Cost-Effective Approach

The pricing structure is straightforward—there’s a fee only when you make a sale (8.99% + R$2.49), which minimizes risk and encourages new creators to jump in.

To sum it up, Kiwify stands out as a comprehensive platform for anyone in Brazil looking to dive into the world of online education. By merging technology with education, they facilitate a path for creators to not only share knowledge but also build a sustainable business around it. If you’re ready to turn your expertise into an online course, Kiwify is your launchpad. 

**Curious to learn more? Visit their website at [Kiwify](https://kiwify.com.br).**
